pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate Sun Position, Sunrise, Sunset, Solar Noon and Twilight // Provides a set of convenient functions for calculating sun- related information, including the sun's position (elevation and azimuth), and the times of sunrise, sunset, solar noon, and twilight for any given geographical location on Earth. These calculations are based on equations provided by the National Oceanic Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) https://gml.noaa.gov/grad/solcalc/calcdetails.html as described in "Astronomical Algorithms" by Jean Meeus (1991, ISBN: 978-0-943396-35-4).
